name: Step 2
description:
Doing stuff is hard, and getting good results out of things is even harder! Wouldn’t it be nice if you could just bypass the hard work of accomplishing things and putting out effort (ewww) just get to the good part? That’s where Step Two comes in: it’s a magical bridge between the most simple, basic first step and the (well-earned) profits (at the end of a difficult journey).

The way to Profit is as simple as 1, 2, 3! Step 1 is always a specific action, but step 2 is a bit more open to interpretation. Step 3 is the easiest, which is to profit!
